locsearch.solution package¶

Submodules¶

locsearch.solution.abstract_local_search_solution module¶

class locsearch.solution.abstract_local_search_solution.AbstractLocalSearchSolution¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Template to create Solution-classes for localsearch implemenatations.

This Class is meant to be used as a template. It is supposed to be used when constructing a heuristic to solve localsearch problems.

data¶

Contains the main datastructure needed to find the solution.

best_solution¶

Is used to remember the best solution found.

Type:AbstractLocalsearchSolution`
move_function¶

Defines the move function used for the problem.

Type:AbstractMove
evaluation_function¶

Defines the evaluation function used for the problem

Type:AbstractEvaluation
best_solution = None
copy()¶

copy method

Returns:deep copy of the object
Return type:AbstractLocalSearchSolution
data = None
evaluate()¶

Evaluates the current solution

Returns:The value of the evaluation function for the current solution.
Return type:int or float
evaluation_function = None
move()¶

Performs a move on data.

The neighbourhood is explored and the current solution is changed to a new solution. move_function is used and the data variable is changed.

move_function = None
